Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution

Class Dispatcher

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.Dispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandedDispatcher, DefaultDispatcher, DispatcherWrapper
public abstract class Dispatcher
extends Object
implements Serializable
The Dispatcher class provides a partial implementation of a message dispatcher. A dispatcher manages the exchange of messages with the other actor spaces of the application.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • setBroker

      public void setBroker​(Reference r)
      Sets the references of the actor space acting as communication broker of the connected actor spaces.

      r - the reference.

    • add

      public void add​(Reference d)
      Adds a connection towards a remote actor space.
      Parameters:
      d - the remote actor space service provider reference.

    • delete

      public void delete​(Reference d)
      Deletes a connection.
      Parameters:
      d - the remote actor space service provider reference.

    • deliver

      public abstract void deliver​(Message m)
      Forwards a message to a remote destination.
      Parameters:
      m - the message. Note that if the actor associate with the destination reference does not exist, then the possible reply is an error message.
      See Also:
      Error.UNREACHABLEACTOR

    • receive

      public void receive​(Message m)
      Receives a message from a remote destination.
      Parameters:
      m - the message.

      public void start()
      Starts the dispatcher.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Closes all the connections to the remote actor spaces.
